html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-02172018-03-06,  ,  ,  PCH, 
ActPublic Service Labour Relations Act
SubjectNational Film Board - Syndicat général du cinéma et de la télévision, Local 4835 (CUPE) ** Collective Agreement **
PrecisOrder Approving of the ENTRY BY THE NATIONAL FILM BOARD, INTO A COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the SYNDICAT GÉNÉRAL DU CINÉMA ET DE LA TÉLÉVISION, LOCAL 4835 (CUPE), in respect of its employees in the Technical category for a term of four (4) years; it comes into force on July 1, 2014 and expires on June 30, 2018.
AttachmentsAttachment
